faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.whatIsLifesheet.answer: Lifesheet is a platform that helps you create and manage your CVs and cover letters.
faq.howDoesItWork.answer: You can create a CV or a cover letter by adding your information and then tailoring it to the job you are applying to.
faq.freeVsPremium: What is the difference between the free and the premium plan?
faq.freeVsPremium.answer: Both plans allow you to create and manage your CVs and cover letters. Both plans have the same features, except the Free plan may contain ads, and the Premium plan does not. The Free plan is also more limited in the number of operations you can perform per day and week. While the Premium plan is not unlimited, the limits are much higher and you will not be likely to reach them.
faq.freeTrial: Do you offer a free trial of the Premium plan?
faq.freeTrial.answer: No, we do not offer a free trial of the Premium plan.
faq.cancelSubscription: How can I cancel my subscription?
faq.cancelSubscription.answer: Our service is not subscription based. You purchase one time and you have access to the service until the end of the purchased period, which can be 30 or 365 days. We may provide refunds for special cases. Contact us at refunds@lifesheet.online
faq.getSupport.answer: You can contact us at support@lifesheet.online
faq.contactUs.answer: You can contact us at support@lifesheet.online
faq.dataSafety: Is my data safe with you?
faq.dataSafety.answer: We do not and will not ever share your data with third parties for profit. If you use our AI Enhanced features, then your information will be shared with our AI providers, and subject to their privacy policies. We will do our best to protect your data, but we cannot guarantee 100% security. Please note that your data is stored in the European Union. It is stored in a non encrypted form, so we could if we wanted to, read it. But we don't want to. You can delete your data at any time by following the instructions in your account settings.
faq.deleteData: How can I delete my data?
faq.deleteData.answer: Go to your account settings. You have two options: Delete your account or Reset your account. Deleting your account will permanently delete your account and all your data. You will not be able to log back in. Resetting your account will permanently reset your account and all your data. You will be able to log back in, but all your data will be lost. Please note that, for operational reasons, we make backups of our databases. We may keep your data for a limited period even after you delete it, for time for backup and recovery purposes. Not more than 30 days, until the backups are synchronized with the main database.
faq.exportData: How can I export my data?
faq.exportData.answer: All the data we have on you is what is part of your main CV. By exporting your CV, you will get a PDF file with all your data.
faq.recoverDeletedAccount: I deleted my account, can you help me recover my data?
faq.recoverResetAccount: I reset my account, can you help me recover my data?
